Articles.Content:
Are there any Addons available for building Satellites other than the MapSat addon?

I'm particularly interested in ones for making TV Satellites.

Roland

I don't know if this is what you're asking for, but you may want to use the kethane mod. You can use it's scanners on a polar-orbiting satellite to search for kethane. You can use the Figaro Global Navigation System, and you can use the RemoteTech mod, as it adds realism to the game.

-Kethane mod: (I couldn't find the link, sorry )

-Figaro GNS: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24646-0-19-Figaro-Global-Navigation-Satellite-System-A-working-Kerbal-GPS-System

-RemoteTech:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/16347-PLUGIN-PARTS-0-19-1-RemoteTech-Relay-Network-%E2%80%93-V-0-5-0-0?highlight=kethane
Damned Robotics is a nice mod to make foldable things It provides hinges, pistons and other stuff.
